about_the_game:
FG Immersive Strongholds Map Pack

The FG Immersive Strongholds Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art pack consists of images that can be used to create bastions and strongholds. You can build unique areas or add to existing maps. This pack includes the following items:

Image Brushes (6)

  • Roof_1_brush.webp

  • Roof_2_brush.webp

  • Stone_1_brush.webp

  • Wall_1_brush.webp

  • Wall_2_brush.webp

  • Wall_3_brush.webp

Image Brushes are great for drawing segmented lines or complex shapes and having it appear to be made out of the material specified in the image. Fantasy Grounds will intelligently join the corners for you to make it look seamless, but you can also try different join styles to match your preference.

Image Fills (2)

  • Wall_1_stone_fill.webp

  • Wall_2_stone_fill.webp

Image Fills are perfect for setting as the fill for shapes (ellipses, circles, rectangles, or custom shapes). You can edit the fill after placement to adjust the location, size, rotation, or even color) in the Edit Fill window.

Decorations (49)

  • Building_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Building_1_decoration_top.webp

  • Building_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Castle_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Castle_part_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Castle_part_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Door_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Door_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Door_3_decoration_forward.webp

  • Door_4_decoration_forward.webp

  • Gate_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Gate_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Hill_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Hill_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Mosaic_decoration.webp

  • Rocks_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Rocks_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Rocks_2_decoration_top.webp

  • Rocks_grass_decoration.webp

  • Rock_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Rock_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Rock_3_decoration_forward.webp

  • Rock_4_decoration_forward.webp

  • Rock_5_decoration_forward.webp

  • Rock_5_decoration_top.webp

  • Rock_6_decoration_forward.webp

  • Rock_6_decoration_top.webp

  • Rock_decoration_top.webp

  • Roof_round_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Ruins_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Ruins_1_decoration_top.webp

  • Ruins_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Ruins_2_decoration_top.webp

  • Ruins_3_decoration_forward.webp

  • Ruins_4_decoration_forward.webp

  • Stones_decoration.webp

  • Temple_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Temple_1_decoration_top.webp

  • Tower_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Tower_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Tower_3_decoration_forward.webp

  • Tower_base_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Tower_base_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Tower_top_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Wall_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Wall_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Window_1_decoration_forward.webp

  • Window_2_decoration_forward.webp

  • Window_3_decoration_forward.webp

Image Decorations are great for placing directly on a top-down map for images labeled with the "top" keyword. Images with the "forward" keyword are best used for the Front image of a Object that you place. You will access this in your Image window under Layers > Objects. Select either Top or Front and drag the image there before placing it. You can test the result out in your map by changing your view from 2D to Free Camera 3D or Token View 3D.

FG Immersive Strongholds Map Pack

The FG Immersive Strongholds Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art pack consists of images that can be used to create bastions and strongholds. You can build unique areas or add to existing maps. This pack includes the following items:

Image Brushes (6)

  • Roof_1_brush.webp

  • Roof_2_brush.webp

  • Stone_1_brush.webp

  • Wall_1_brush.webp

  • Wall_2_brush.webp

  • Wall_3_brush.webp

Image Brushes are great for drawing segmented lines or complex shapes and having it appear to be made out of the material specified in the image. Fantasy Grounds will intelligently join the corners for you to make it look seamless, but you can also try different join styles to match your preference.

Image Fills (2)

  • Wall_2_stone_fill.webp

Image Fills are perfect for setting as the fill for shapes (ellipses, circles, rectangles, or custom shapes). You can edit the fill after placement to adjust the location, size, rotation, or even color) in the Edit Fill window.
